title: No Bones About It
description: WRITER'S DIGEST AWARD WINNING AUTHOROn the heels of a nasty divorce, a dog trainer is blamed for her ex-husband’s messy death. Evidence suggests that she programmed their shared guard dog to attack the prominent diet doctor, but did she? As the accused is being led off to jail, she begs her friend and sometime sleuth, Ginger Barnes, to save the German shepherd’s life, an assignment that demands nothing less than the whole truth.
author: Donna Huston Murray
